subtitle.Text: I was telling Lonnie that I got into my summer college program thing, and I was all making plans like, "you should come visit me, stay in my dorm room! But she said, "Sam, I ship out on June 6th."
I was like... ship out? To where?
She said, "to Basic Training! What did you think I was doing all that ROTC stuff for?"
I guess she's been planning to join the Army right after high school since she was like, 12. And I guess she's really going to do it.
So I was like, "after graduation, I'm just... never going to see you again?"
She said, "let's just have fun while we can."
